Sentencas: The behaviour of an integrated-planar solid oxide fuel cell (IP-SOFC) strongly depends on the reactive diffusive flows within its porous support structure.
Titulo: Three-dimensional simulation of chemically reacting gas flows in the porous support structure of an integrated-planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Fuel is transported through the porous structure to the anodes of the electrochemical cells and the structure may be impregnated with the required catalysts for the steam reforming of methane.
Titulo: Three-dimensional simulation of chemically reacting gas flows in the porous support structure of an integrated-planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: It is important to be able to calculate the distribution of gas properties within the porous structure in order to predict the performance of each cell and to determine the amount of internal reforming that takes place.
Titulo: Three-dimensional simulation of chemically reacting gas flows in the porous support structure of an integrated-planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This paper describes a three-dimensional numerical calculation method which has been developed to solve the governing equations in the porous structure.
Titulo: Three-dimensional simulation of chemically reacting gas flows in the porous support structure of an integrated-planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The calculation method includes the interaction between the flow in the porous medium and that in the adjacent fuel supply channel.
Titulo: Three-dimensional simulation of chemically reacting gas flows in the porous support structure of an integrated-planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The results highlight the importance of the kinetics of the reforming reaction and the thermal boundary conditions, both of which have a significant effect on the flow field within the porous structure.
Titulo: Three-dimensional simulation of chemically reacting gas flows in the porous support structure of an integrated-planar solid oxide fuel cell
